definition: outer skin/surface/leather cover (of a book)/drum skin/leather upper (of a shoe)
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: He counted the creases of rucked leather wherein another's foot had nested warm.
sentences.chinese: 他數着皮面上的皺紋，這曾經是另一個人暖腳的窩。

sentences.english: 'Not on the highest setting or you might burn up the leather, ' he notes.
sentences.chinese: 他說，不要把風力開到最高檔，否則可能會燙傷皮面。

sentences.english: He binds this book with leather.
The leather surface embossed by this machine is glossy, smooth and of very strong plastic effect.
sentences.chinese: 經該機壓印後的花紋皮面光澤圓滑，立體性極強。

sentences.english: The publishing house decided to bind the new book in leather.
sentences.chinese: 這家出版社決定用皮面裝幀新書。

sentences.english: The traditional manual sculpture craft, plus complex leather face processing technology.
sentences.chinese: 傳統手工雕刻工藝，加上覆雜的皮面處理技術。

sentences.english: This device in the inspection instep leather and various kinds of thin leather, leather face of things resistance index chapping.
sentences.chinese: 本器在檢驗鞋面革及各種薄物革，皮面之抗龜裂指數。

definition: dermis (layer within the skin containing sense of touch)
to scrub with an abrasive/to sand/frosted (e.g. glass)
